title: Imports could be organized more systematically
description: The contract's interface should be imported first, followed by each of the interfaces it uses, followed by all other files. The examples below do not follow this layout

title: Variable names don't follow the Solidity style guide
description: For constant variable names, each word should use all capital letters, with underscores separating each word (CONSTANT_CASE)

title: else-block is not required
description: One level of nesting can be removed by not having an else block when the if-block returns

title: Events may be emitted out of order due to a possible reentrancy
description: Ensure that events follow the best practice of check-effects-interaction, and are emitted before external calls

title: Named mappings is recommended for understandability
description: Consider moving to solidity version 0.8.18 or later, and use named mappings to make it easier to understand the purpose of each mapping

title: Using a return statement with named return variables is redundant
description: Remove the return statement or change the return variables to unnamed ones.

title: The named return variables are not used anywhere in the function
description: Utilize the named return variables, or change them to unnamed ones instead
